code_snippet:
if arg:
        query = 'SHOW FIELDS FROM {0}'.format(arg)
    else:
        query = 'SHOW TABLES'
    log.debug(query)
    cur.execute(query)
    tables = cur.fetchall()
    status = ''
    if cur.description:
        headers = [x[0] for x in cur.description]
    else:
        return [(None, None, None, '')]

    if verbose and arg:
        query = 'SHOW CREATE TABLE {0}'.format(arg)
        log.debug(query)
        cur.execute(query)
        status = cur.fetchone()[1]

    return [(None, tables, headers, status)]
